code:
import turtle

wn = turtle.Screen()
wn.bgcolor("green")

p4 = turtle.Turtle()
p4.color('yellow')
p4.shape('turtle')
p4.penup()
p4.goto(-120,-10)
p4.pendown()

guide.img: Now that we have created our third player, Let’s go ahead and create the next player with the same logic
Let’s create p4, set its colour to yellow and shape to a turtle
guide.code:
import turtle

wn = turtle.Screen()
wn.bgcolor("green")

p4 = turtle.Turtle()
p4.color('yellow')
p4.shape('turtle')

guide.img: Let’s set the position of p4 x to -120 as before, and reduce y by 30 pixels, therefore, setting it at -10
guide.code:
import turtle

wn = turtle.Screen()
wn.bgcolor("green")

p4 = turtle.Turtle()
p4.color('yellow')
p4.shape('turtle')
p4.penup()
p4.goto(-120,-10)
